item.title: PetalPatrol - Botanical Inventory Management
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: PetalPatrol is a specialized application for managing and analyzing floristic inventory data to optimize botanical studies and facilitate field data collection of plant observations.
